definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: At the very least, that will make it hard for a future President to keep tax-cut promises.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，下一任总统将很难兑现他们减税的承诺。

sentences.english: Although I only am the unrequited love, no matter what, I had loved you.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我只是单相思，不管怎样，曾经我是爱过你的。

sentences.english: Brady said he would reflect on what the future might hold in the coming weeks.
sentences.chinese: 布兰迪说未来数周以后，不管怎样，他都会接受结果。

sentences.english: Its a shame you had to go so fast but take care anyway.
sentences.chinese: 真可惜你那么快又要走了，不管怎样，一路保重。

sentences.english: Be good anyway. Give the world the best you have anyway.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，总是要将你所拥有的最好的东西献给世界。

sentences.english: Anyhow, this knowledge has not sunk in for so many people.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，这种观念并没有被许多人接受。

sentences.english: Moreover, it is an excellent hay, which can be cut twice.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，这总是一种可以收割两次的草料。

sentences.english: You really shouldn't watch so much television anyway.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，你真的应少看些电视了。

sentences.english: Practice it, try to be happy no matter what.
sentences.chinese: 多练习几次，不管怎样都要试着开心起来。

sentences.english: So long as it was still day, Trufa managed somehow to endure her grief.
sentences.chinese: 只要天还没黑，特鲁法不管怎样还能设法忍受悲痛。

sentences.english: Anyway, go and ask the Business Centre.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，去到商务中心问问吧。

sentences.english: The preparations for the summit, at any rate, have been unusually contentious.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，这次峰会的筹备工作还是饱受争议。

sentences.english: Anyway, it was pretty Christmasy all of a sudden.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，刹那间，四周已是一片圣诞景象。

sentences.english: Anyway, kudos to these researchers for studying women.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，这些荣誉给研究女性的研究者们。

sentences.english: Anyway, do you dare to “wear” like them and walking on the street?
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，你敢“穿”得像他们一样在街头秀一下吗？
不管怎样，你总会长大的。

definition: whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
in the end/after all is said and done
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
